content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Copper Cable Factory (centered around assembling machine at Position(x=1.5, y=19.5))
Consists of the following entities:
• Cable factory input chest at Position(x=2.5, y=17.5)
• New factory burner inserter at Position(x=2.5, y=16.5)
• Dedicated burner inserter (placed at the copper cable factory interface) at Position(x=3.5, y=17.5)
• Assembling machine at Position(x=1.5, y=19.5)

### Belt Depot Structure at Position(x=3.5, y=15.5)
Consists of the following entities:
• Wooden chest (crafted and placed as an isolated belt depot) at Position(x=3.5, y=15.5)
• Transport belt segment (placed adjacent to the chest) at Position(x=4.5, y=15.5)
• Depot burner inserter (placed adjacent to the chest) at Position(x=3.5, y=14.5) with pickup at Position(x=3.5, y=15.5) and drop at Position(x=3.5, y=13.5)

### Electricity Generator at Position(x=-0.5, y=24.5)
Consists of the following entities:
• Steam engine at Position(x=-0.5, y=24.5)
• Boiler at Position(x=-5.5, y=24.0)
• Offshore pump at Position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)

ERROR TIPS
────────────
• Errors when connecting transport belts:
 – Multiple steps (210, 211, 213, 214, 215, 216, 217) report the error that transport belts cannot be connected directly to a Prototype.SteamEngine object.
 – Tip: Always add an inserter that inputs items into the steam engine and use that as the belt’s target.

• Errors due to placement range:
 – In Step 212, placing a wooden chest at Position(x=3.5, y=15.5) failed because the target was too far from the player.
 – Tip: Move closer to the target position to ensure it falls within the allowable placement distance.

• Name reference error:
 – In Step 212 the variable ‘target_chest’ was not defined.
 – Tip: Verify and use the correct variable names when referencing entities to avoid such NameErrors.

• Inventory shortage issues:
 – In Step 213, placement of a wooden chest failed because no wooden chest was available in inventory.
 – Tip: Confirm the required item is present in inventory before attempting to place it.
